violations.description: Ensures that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
violations.help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

any.message: Text inside the element is not included in the accessible name

nodes.html: <button class="plyr__controls__item plyr__control" type="button" data-plyr="play" aria-pressed="false" aria-label="Play">
nodes.failureSummary:

  Text inside the element is not included in the accessible name
